title: GISData
description: Smart Data Models - A Data Model for water supply network in a city.

description.description: Property. Description for an IUDX thing.

dataDescriptor.description: Relationship. URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity

waterPressure.description: Property. Pressure of water flowing from the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankCapacity.description: Property. Maximum amount of water the water storage tank corresponding to this observation can hold.

tankName.description: Property. Name of the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

turbidity.description: Property. Measurement of the amount of light that is scattered by material in the water when a light is shined through the water.

pH.description: Property. Acidity level or basicity level obsevered in the water.

tankDiameter.description: Property. Diameter of Cylindrical or Spherical water storage tanks.

tankShape.description: Property. Physical shape of the water storage tank corresponding to this observation. ENUM: [Cylindrical, Conical, Cuboid, Spherical]

waterFlow.description: Property. Flow or current of water flowing from the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

waterLevel.description: Property. Current water level in the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankBreadth.description: Property. Breadth of the Cuboid shaped water storage tank.

totalML.description: Property. Total MLDs of water discharged from the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

flowrate.description: Property. Volume of water flowing in/out of the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

cl.description: Property. Concentration of chlorides in the water.

waterTemperature.description: Property. Water temperature in the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankdepth.description: Property. Depth of the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankLength.description: Property. Length of the Cuboid shaped water storage tank.

deviceInfo.description: Property. Information about the device associated with the observations.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Last reported time of observation.
